titles.title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to change the quarterly reporting requirement with respect to certain registered securities to a semi-annual reporting requirement.
Semi-Annual Act of 2018
Semi-Annual Act of 2018
Semi-Annual Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Semi-Annual Act of 2018
This bill reduces the required reporting frequency for certain issuers of securities from quarterly to semiannually.
